title: Implement Hover Gallery component
description:
daisyUI includes a Hover Gallery component for interactive image galleries.

Status: Not implemented
Priority: Low (specialized use case)

CSS Class:
- hover-gallery - Applied to container (div or figure)

HTML Structure:
Simple pattern with multiple img elements inside container. First image visible by default, others show on horizontal hover.

Features:
- Container of images with hover interaction
- First image visible by default
- Horizontal hover reveals other images
- Supports up to 10 images
- Creates invisible columns for each non-first image

Use Cases:
- Ecommerce product displays
- Portfolios
- Image galleries
- Product card integration

Implementation Notes:
Component should accept children (images) and handle the hover interaction through CSS classes. May want to provide typed props for controlling which image is default.

Reference: https://daisyui.com/components/hover-gallery/

title: Phase 4: Color Customization
description: Color picker for all semantic tokens. Components: ColorCustomizer with color inputs, hex to Oklahoma LCH conversion, palette preview, accessibility checker.

title: Create ColorCustomizer component
description: Build UI with color pickers for all semantic tokens (primary, secondary, accent, neutral, base-100/200/300, info, success, warning, error). Organize into logical sections.

title: Implement color picker integration
description: HTML5 color input for visual picking + text input for manual hex entry. Support both formats, keep them synchronized.

title: Add hex to Oklahoma LCH conversion
description: Implement color space conversion from hex to Oklahoma LCH format required by daisyUI 5. Use oklch() CSS function syntax.

title: Create color palette preview
description: Show buttons, cards, badges, and alerts with current colors. Live preview updates as user changes colors. Display all semantic color variants.

title: Add color accessibility checker
description: Check contrast ratios for WCAG compliance (AA and AAA levels). Warn when text/background combinations fail accessibility standards. Show contrast ratio values.

title: Test color customization
description: Verify all color tokens update correctly. Test Oklahoma LCH conversion accuracy. Ensure colors persist across theme switches and page reloads.

title: Carousel indicator buttons cause page scroll
description: On the Carousel page, in both 'With Indicator Dots' and 'With Navigation Buttons' sections, clicking indicator buttons (1,2,3,4) causes page to scroll down a few rows. May be related to scrollIntoView() focus behavior. Need to use scrollIntoView with block: 'nearest' option.

title: Implement Calendar component
description:
daisyUI 5 includes a Calendar component that provides styling for three popular calendar libraries.

Status: Not implemented
Priority: Medium (for 100% component coverage)

The Calendar component is a styling-focused component that supports:
1. Cally - A web component that works universally
2. Pikaday - JavaScript date picker library
3. React Day Picker - React-specific date picker

CSS Classes:
- cally
- pika-single
- react-day-picker

Implementation approach:
Since daisyUI Calendar is a styling wrapper for external libraries, the Leptos implementation should:
1. Provide wrapper components for each library type
2. Document integration with each calendar library
3. Handle the web component integration for Cally
4. Provide examples of usage with leptos_use or other date utilities

Reference: https://daisyui.com/components/calendar/

title: Pagination components do not update selection on click
description: On the Pagination page, multiple pagination components (Basic, Numbered, Disabled States, Sizes, Responsive, With Ellipsis) do not change selection when clicked - the original value remains highlighted. The click event may not be wired correctly or the active state is not updating.

title: Optimize ClassAttributes string building performance
description:
The ClassAttributes.to_class() method clones strings unnecessarily during filtering and collection.

File: src/utils/class_attribute.rs:32-54
Severity: Medium
Type: Performance
Impact: Affects all components on every render

Current implementation uses filter_map with clone and to_string which is inefficient.

Recommended fix: Build string directly without cloning by using as_str() references and push_str().

title: Menu component selections cause unwanted page scroll
description: On the Menus page, when selecting any menu component (SubMenus, Sizes, Interactive, Sidebar), the page scrolls up a few rows. Related to focus management. Need to prevent default scroll behavior or adjust focus handling.

title: Advanced Runtime Theming System
description:
Implement comprehensive runtime theming system that allows users to:
- Select base daisyUI themes
- Customize typography (fonts, sizes, scales)
- Customize colors with color picker
- Customize borders and spacing
- Override component-specific styles
- Export/import theme configurations
- Persist themes across sessions

This epic encompasses all work defined in THEMING_STRATEGY.md and will be delivered
in phases to allow incremental testing and validation.

Success Criteria:
- Users can customize all major theme aspects via UI
- Changes apply instantly via CSS variables
- Themes persist in localStorage
- Export/import functionality works
- No breaking changes to existing code
- Comprehensive documentation and examples

Reference: THEMING_STRATEGY.md

title: Add comprehensive interactive testing to CI pipeline
description: Current testing validates component loading and console errors but not interactive functionality. Consider adding automated interactive tests using Chrome DevTools or similar tools to verify: hover effects, click interactions, modal open/close, dropdown expansion, accordion toggle, etc. Discovered during: Manual interactive testing revealed 5 components with missing CSS that passed initial validation.

title: Phase 5: Border & Spacing Customization
description: Customize borders and spacing system-wide. Components: BorderCustomizer with width slider, radius selector, spacing scale, preview cards.

title: Create BorderCustomizer component
description: Build UI for border and spacing controls

title: Add border width controls
description: Slider for default border width (0-8px)

title: Add border radius controls
description: Selector for border radius (none, sm, md, lg, full)

title: Implement spacing scale
description: Multiplier for spacing system (0.5x to 2x)

title: Add preview cards
description: Show cards, buttons, inputs with current border/spacing settings

title: Test border and spacing changes
description: Verify CSS variables apply correctly

title: Implement Divider component demo
description: On the Divider page, components show 'coming soon' placeholders. Need to implement Divider component demo showcasing horizontal/vertical dividers with text and various styles.

title: Phase 2: Base Theme Selection
description: Enhance theme switching with 32 daisyUI themes. Components: BaseThemeSelector with grid layout, theme switching with animations, CSS variable preservation during theme changes.

title: Enhance ThemeController component
description: Update existing ThemeController to integrate with new ThemeProvider. Ensure it can switch themes while preserving custom CSS variable overrides.

title: Create BaseThemeSelector component
description: Build grid UI showing all 32 daisyUI themes with preview cards. Show theme name and preview of primary, secondary, accent colors for each theme.

title: Implement theme switching logic
description: Handle theme changes while preserving CSS variable overrides. When user switches base theme, keep custom typography/color overrides intact.

title: Add transition animations
description: Smooth transitions between themes using CSS transitions. Animate color changes, preserve layout during theme switch.

title: Test theme switching
description: Verify all 32 themes work correctly. Test theme persistence across page reloads. Ensure custom CSS variables are preserved when switching themes.

title: Add validation for Countdown component value range
description:
Countdown component accepts u8 (0-255) but only values 0-99 display correctly with animation.

File: src/components/countdown/component.rs:44
Severity: Low
Type: Usability

The documentation states value must be 0-99 but no validation is performed. Values outside this range will not animate correctly.

Recommended fix options:
1. Clamp value: style=move || format("--value:{};", value.get().min(99))
2. Document that values > 99 display but do not animate
3. Create a newtype wrapper that enforces 0-99 range

title: Implement DataTable component (table-rs inspired)
description:
Create advanced DataTable component inspired by opensass/table-rs with sorting, pagination, search, and loading states.

## Reference
- opensass/table-rs: https://github.com/opensass/table-rs
- Comparison doc: TABLE_COMPARISON.md

## Goals
Provide production-ready data table with features out-of-the-box while maintaining daisyUI theme integration.

## Features (MVP)
1. Column-based data structure (HashMap)
2. Sorting (ascending/descending per column)
3. Pagination with page controls
4. Loading states
5. Empty states
6. daisyUI theme integration
7. Customizable classes and texts

## NOT in MVP
- URL sync (future enhancement)
- Search/filter (future enhancement)
- Custom renderers (future enhancement)

## Implementation
- src/components/data_table/
- Keep existing Table components for flexibility
- New DataTable for smart features

## Success Criteria
- Works with 10,000+ rows efficiently
- Sorting is instant
- Pagination is smooth
- Fully themed with daisyUI
- Simple API for users

## Estimated Effort
2-3 weeks

## Benefits
- Critical missing feature for business apps
- WASM-optimized performance
- Less boilerplate for users
- Competitive with other UI libraries

title: Design DataTable API and types
description: Design Leptos-friendly API for DataTable component. Define Column struct, DataTableProps, DataTableClasses, DataTableTexts. Review table-rs Yew implementation and adapt for Leptos patterns.

title: Implement core DataTable component
description: Implement main DataTable component with column rendering, basic table structure, daisyUI styling integration. Files: src/components/data_table/component.rs, types.rs, mod.rs

title: Implement sorting logic
description: Add column sorting (ascending/descending toggle). Sort indicators in headers. Sortable column configuration. aria-sort accessibility attributes.

title: Implement pagination controls
description: Add pagination UI with Previous/Next buttons. Page indicator (Page X of Y). Page size configuration. Integration with daisyUI Join component for buttons.

title: Add loading and empty states
description: Display loading row when loading=true. Display empty message when no data. Customizable loading/empty text. Proper styling with daisyUI.

title: Create DataTable demo and documentation
description: Add DataTable to demo app. Document API and usage examples. Add to README.md. Test with various dataset sizes (100, 1000, 10000+ rows).

title: Validator page shows no content
description: On the Validator page, nothing is visible. The demo/src/demos/validator.rs file exists but components are not rendering. Need to investigate and fix rendering issue.

title: Document prop:checked vs checked usage in Drawer
description:
Drawer component uses prop:checked while other components use checked attribute directly.

File: src/components/drawer/component.rs:79
Severity: Low
Type: Documentation

This inconsistency may be intentional for Leptos reactivity but should be documented to help future contributors understand the pattern.

Task: Add comment explaining when to use prop:checked vs checked attribute and document the reasoning for the Drawer implementation choice.

title: Improve Menu context panic handling
Standardize optional parameter patterns across components
description:
Inconsistent use of #[prop(optional)] vs #[prop(optional, into)] for node_ref parameters.

Severity: Low
Type: Code Quality/Usability

Some components have #[prop(optional)] for node_ref while others have #[prop(optional, into)]. This inconsistency may confuse users.

The 'into' should not be needed for NodeRef parameters since NodeRef is already the target type.

Recommended fix: Audit all components and standardize to #[prop(optional)] for all NodeRef parameters.

title: Add more Dock component examples and improve labels
description: On the Dock page, add more examples to the bottom dock component to visually demonstrate usage. The labels 'Basic Dock', 'Home', 'Interactive Dock', 'Dock Sizes' don't appear functional - clarify if they should change how the dock displays or remove them.

title: Remove empty strings from merge_classes calls in Table components
description:
Table components use merge_classes with empty string as first parameter which is unnecessary.

Files affected:
- src/components/table/component.rs:86,112,138,164,190,216

Current code:
class=move || merge_classes("", class)

This is inefficient since there is no base class to merge.

Recommended fix:
Option 1: class=class
Option 2: class=move || class

If no base classes are needed, the merge_classes wrapper is not necessary.

title: Accordion does not close when clicking up-carat
description: On the Accordion page, accordion opens when pressing down-carat symbol, but does not close when pressing up-carat symbol. It only closes when opening another accordion. Need to fix toggle behavior.

title: Stack page shows no content
description: On the Stack page, nothing is visible. The demo/src/demos/stack.rs file exists but components are not rendering. Need to investigate and fix rendering issue.

title: Implement FAB (Floating Action Button) component
description:
daisyUI 5 includes a FAB/Speed Dial component for floating action buttons.

Status: Not implemented (new in daisyUI 5)
Priority: High (missing core action component)

CSS Classes:
- fab - Main container element
- fab-close - Close button that replaces main button when open
- fab-main-action - Alternative action button when expanded
- fab-flower - Quarter-circle arrangement instead of vertical

HTML Structure Requirements:
- Focusable div with tabindex for browser compatibility
- role='button' for accessibility
- Trigger element (div with tabindex=0)
- Optional close/main-action button wrapper
- Speed dial buttons that display on click/focus

Layout Variations:
- Vertical arrangement (default)
- Flower layout (quarter-circle for 1-4 buttons)
- Labels and icons support

Implementation Notes:
Safari has CSS bug preventing button elements from being focused, so div with tabindex is required.

Reference: https://daisyui.com/components/fab/

title: Add image preview to File Input Profile Picture Upload
description: On the File Input page, in the Profile Picture Upload section, when user presses upload button and selects an image, replace the avatar component image with the uploaded image. Provides instant visual feedback.

title: Implement Text Rotate component
description:
daisyUI includes a Text Rotate component for animating text rotation.

Status: Not implemented
Priority: Low (nice-to-have animation component)

CSS Classes:
- text-rotate - Core component class

HTML Structure (3-level nesting):
- Outer span: text-rotate class
- Middle span: Container (can use justify-items-center)
- Inner spans: Individual text items (up to 6)

Features:
- Displays up to 6 lines of text, one at a time
- Infinite loop animation
- 10 second default duration
- Pauses on hover
- Customizable with duration-* utilities
- Supports line height, font sizing, colors

Implementation Notes:
Should support Signal for reactive text updates and allow customization of animation duration.

Reference: https://daisyui.com/components/text-rotate/

title: 4 new components need full implementation (not just CSS declarations)
description: Critical: 5 newly implemented components (Hover 3D, Hover Gallery, FAB, Text Rotate, Tooltip) are not working because their CSS class declarations are missing from demo/input.css. Components affected: Hover 3D (no 3D tilt), Hover Gallery (no image reveal), FAB (speed dial always visible), Text Rotate (no animation), Tooltip (not visible). Fix: Add @source inline() declarations to demo/input.css. Discovered during Chrome DevTools MCP interactive testing.
notes:
UPDATED FINDING: Adding @source inline() declarations was not sufficient. These 4 components need actual implementation:

1. Hover 3D - Needs JavaScript mousemove event handlers for 3D tilt effect
2. Hover Gallery - Needs JavaScript hover interaction logic for image reveals  
3. FAB - Needs CSS to hide speed dial buttons initially (currently all visible)
4. Text Rotate - Needs CSS keyframe animations for rotation effect

These are NOT standard daisyUI 5 components - they're custom additions that need:
- Custom CSS stylesheets with animations/transitions
- JavaScript event handlers (for Hover 3D, Hover Gallery)
- Proper initial state CSS (for FAB)

Tooltip works because it uses native CSS :hover pseudo-class.

Current status: Components render HTML structure but have no functionality.
Files: src/components/hover_3d/, src/components/fab/, src/components/text_rotate/, src/components/hover_gallery/
close_reason: All 4 components (Hover 3D, Hover Gallery, FAB, Text Rotate) now fully implemented with JavaScript event handlers and CSS. All reactive tracking warnings fixed. All clippy warnings resolved.

title: Drawer close animation shows at wrong position
description: On the Drawer page, in Basic Drawer section, drawer opens correctly on left side of component border, but when clicking 'x' to close, animation shows drawer closing on page's left-hand side instead of component border. Animation origin needs to be fixed.

title: Implement Hover 3D functionality with JavaScript event handlers
description: Hover 3D component renders HTML structure but lacks JavaScript event handlers for 3D tilt effect. Component creates 8 hover zones but has no mousemove listeners to calculate and apply CSS transforms. Needs: mousemove event handler to track mouse position, calculate tilt angles, apply transform: rotateX/rotateY styles. Currently: Elements render with hover-3d class but remain static. Test: Hover over card - no 3D tilt effect occurs. Related issue: leptos-daisyui-rs-7v8

title: Implement Range component demo
description: On the Range page, the component shows 'coming soon...' placeholder. Need to implement the Range component demo showcasing slider functionality with various sizes, steps, and colors.

title: Add auto-play timer to Carousel Direction Control
description: On the Carousel page, in the Directional Control component, add an optional timer that automatically switches images every 3 seconds in a loop. Should include play/pause controls and be configurable.

title: Replace unreachable macro with defensive code in ClassAttributes
Consider wrapping Hero password input in form element
description: Hero component demo shows browser message 'Password field not in form'. This is informational, not an error, but could be improved by wrapping password input in a form element for best practices. Location: demo/src/demos/hero.rs. Severity: Very Low (informational only). Discovered during: Navigation category testing.

title: Phase 7: Import/Export & Polish
description: Final polish, import/export, documentation. Components: JSON import/export, preset themes gallery, theme sharing, comprehensive docs, tutorial videos.

title: Implement JSON export
description: Download theme config as JSON file

title: Add JSON import with validation
description: Upload and validate theme JSON

title: Create preset themes gallery
description: Showcase of pre-configured themes

title: Add theme sharing functionality
description: Copy shareable JSON or URL

title: Write comprehensive documentation
description: User guide, API docs, examples

title: Create example implementations
description: Sample apps demonstrating theming

title: Polish UI and UX
description: Final refinements, animations, error messages

title: Accessibility audit
description: Ensure theme customizer is keyboard/screen reader accessible

title: Fix Link component default href security issue
description:
The Link component uses href.unwrap_or("#") which creates navigation issues. The # anchor scrolls to top of page when href is None.

File: src/components/link/component.rs:45
Severity: Medium
Type: Security/Usability

Current code:
```rust
href=href.unwrap_or("#")
```

Recommended fix options:
1. Make href required (breaking change)
2. Use javascript:void(0) as default
3. Conditionally render href attribute only when Some

Prefer option 3 for best UX.

title: Link page shows no content
description: On the Link page, nothing is visible. The demo/src/demos/link.rs file exists but components are not rendering. Need to investigate and fix rendering issue.

title: Mask page shows no content
description: On the Mask page, nothing is visible. The demo/src/demos/mask.rs file exists but components are not rendering. Need to investigate and fix rendering issue.

title: Phase 1: Theming Foundation
description:
Build the core architecture for the theming system:

Core Components:
- Theme data structures (ThemeConfiguration, ThemeOverrides, etc.)
- ThemeProvider context with signals
- CSS variable injection system
- localStorage persistence layer
- Utility functions

Deliverables:
- src/theme/mod.rs with all data structures
- ThemeProvider component
- inject_css_variables() function
- save_theme_config() and load_theme_config()
- Comprehensive unit tests

Dependencies: None (foundation layer)
Blocks: All subsequent phases

Timeline: Week 1-2

title: Define theme data structures
description:
Create ThemeConfiguration, ThemeOverrides, FontFamily, FontScale, ColorOverrides, BorderOverrides, ComponentOverrides, ThemeMetadata structs with Serialize/Deserialize.

Implementation details:
- ThemeConfiguration: base_theme, overrides, metadata
- ThemeOverrides: colors, fonts, borders, components
- All structs derive Serialize, Deserialize, Clone, Debug, Default
- Use Option<T> for all override fields
- Add comprehensive inline documentation

title: Implement ThemeProvider context
description:
Create ThemeProvider component with RwSignal, actions for apply/reset/export/import, and provide_context.

Implementation details:
- ThemeProvider component accepting children
- RwSignal<ThemeConfiguration> for reactive state
- Actions: apply_theme(), reset_theme(), export_theme(), import_theme()
- Provide context using Leptos provide_context
- Initial state from localStorage or default
- Signal-driven reactivity for all theme changes

title: Build CSS variable injection system
description:
Implement inject_css_variables() that reads config and sets CSS custom properties on document root.

Implementation details:
- inject_css_variables(config: &ThemeConfiguration) function
- Map theme config to CSS custom properties
- Set properties on document.documentElement
- Handle font family, font scale, colors, borders
- Proper error handling for DOM operations
- Support for dynamic updates (reactive injection)

title: Add localStorage persistence
description:
Implement save_theme_config() and load_theme_config() with proper error handling.

Implementation details:
- save_theme_config(config: &ThemeConfiguration) -> Result<(), String>
- load_theme_config() -> Result<ThemeConfiguration, String>
- Use serde_json for serialization
- Use web_sys::window().local_storage()
- Key: 'leptos-daisyui-theme-config'
- Proper error messages for parse/storage failures
- Fallback to default config on errors

title: Create utility functions
description:
Implement hex_to_oklch(), download_json(), and helper functions.

Implementation details:
- hex_to_oklch(hex: &str) -> String for color conversion
- download_json(config: &ThemeConfiguration, filename: &str)
- create_download_link() helper
- validate_hex_color(hex: &str) -> bool
- Use web_sys for DOM operations
- Proper error handling and validation

title: Write foundation tests
description:
Unit tests for data structures, serialization, and core functions.

Test coverage:
- ThemeConfiguration serialization/deserialization
- Default implementations
- CSS variable injection (mock DOM)
- localStorage operations (mock storage)
- Color conversion functions
- Download functionality
- Error handling paths
- Edge cases and validation

Use cargo test with wasm-bindgen-test for browser APIs

title: Top Dropdown opens below button instead of above
description: On the Dropdown page, the 'Top Dropdown' button shows options below the button, but should appear above. Need to fix dropdown positioning logic to respect the 'top' direction.

comments.author: davidcforbes
comments.text: Fixed: Added missing placement=DropdownPlacement::Top prop to the Top dropdown in demo/src/demos/dropdown.rs on line 28. The component implementation was correct - it properly applies the dropdown-top CSS class when the placement prop is set to Top. The demo just wasn't using the placement prop, so it defaulted to Bottom placement.

title: Navbar components only show letter 's'
description: On the Navbar page, only a letter 's' is visible underneath 'Basic Navbar' label and 'Navbar with Menu' label. The navbar components are not rendering correctly.

title: Accordion Plus indicator shows wrong symbol
description: On the Accordion page, when opening the Plus indicator accordion, the symbol displayed is '^' (Unicode error) but should be a minus '-'. Character encoding or font issue needs to be fixed.

title: Indicator badges all in top-right, not showing various positions
description: On the Indicator page, all indicator badges are displayed in the top-right corner, but should be displayed in various positions (top-left, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-right) as named in each box. The positioning CSS is not working correctly.

title: List page shows no content
description: On the List page, nothing is visible. The demo/src/demos/list.rs file exists but components are not rendering. Need to investigate and fix rendering issue.

title: Add footer status bar to demo app
description: Add a footer bar to the demo app that displays: (1) full path of directory where application launched from, (2) amount of memory the application is using, (3) current date and time. This provides useful development/debugging information.

title: Fix documentation typos across multiple components
description:
Multiple documentation spelling errors found:

1. Validator component (src/components/validator/component.rs:10):
   - 'clildren' should be 'children'
   - 'suach' should be 'such'

2. ThemeController component (src/components/theme_controller/component.rs:18):
   - Same typos as Validator

3. ChatFooter component (src/components/chat/component.rs:156):
   - 'fotter' should be 'footer'

4. CardActions component (src/components/card/component.rs:120):
   - Incomplete documentation truncated at HTMLDivElement

5. Breadcrumbs component (src/components/breadcrumbs/component.rs:17):
   - 'Rederences' should be 'References'

6. Dropdown component (src/components/dropdown/component.rs:14):
   - Extra double quotes in CSS source directive

title: Fix Pagination demo reactive tracking warnings
description: Pagination demo has 35 reactive tracking warnings at lines 244, 429, 438, 466 in demo/src/demos/pagination.rs. Multiple signals accessed with .get() outside reactive tracking context. Fix: Wrap in closures: move || signal.get(). Severity: Low (demo code only, component works). Discovered during: Component validation testing.

title: Add 30 Thaw-UI-inspired components to leptos-daisyui-rs
description:
Expand leptos-daisyui-rs with 30 additional components inspired by Thaw UI library.

## Overview
Add all unique components from Thaw UI (https://github.com/thaw-ui/thaw) that don't exist in daisyUI, maintaining daisyUI theme integration while using Thaw UI as reference for functionality and interactivity.

## Goals
- Implement 30 new components (from 62 to 92 total components)
- Maintain daisyUI theme system integration
- Follow existing library patterns (Signals, NodeRef, spread attributes)
- Use Thaw UI as reference for UX/interactivity
- Style components to work with daisyUI themes

## Component Categories
1. Form & Data Input (10 components)
2. Layout & Structure (6 components)
3. Data Display & Typography (5 components)
4. Navigation (2 components)
5. Feedback & Loading (3 components)
6. Specialized (3 components)
7. System (1 component)

## Reference
- Thaw UI: https://thawui.vercel.app
- Thaw GitHub: https://github.com/thaw-ui/thaw
- Component comparison: THAW_COMPARISON.md

title: Form & Data Input Components (10 components)
description:
Implement advanced form and data input components from Thaw UI.

Components:
1. AutoComplete - Input with auto-completion suggestions
2. ColorPicker - Color selection interface
3. Combobox - Combined dropdown + searchable input
4. DatePicker - Calendar-based date selection
5. Field - Form field wrapper with label/validation
6. Slider - Range slider with handles
7. SpinButton - Number input with increment/decrement buttons
8. TagPicker - Multi-select tag input
9. TimePicker - Time selection interface
10. Upload - File upload with drag-drop

Priority: HIGH - These are critical missing components for form-heavy applications.

title: Implement AutoComplete component
description: Input with auto-completion suggestions. Reference: Thaw UI auto-complete. Features: dropdown suggestions, keyboard navigation, async data, customizable rendering. Files: src/components/auto_complete/

title: Implement Upload component
description: File upload with drag-drop, multiple files, previews, progress, size/type restrictions. More advanced than FileInput. Reference: Thaw UI upload. Files: src/components/upload/

title: Implement ColorPicker component
description: Color selection interface with palette, hex/RGB/HSL modes, eye dropper, alpha control. Reference: Thaw UI color-picker. Files: src/components/color_picker/

title: Implement Combobox component
description: Searchable dropdown with filter-as-you-type, multi-select, option groups. Reference: Thaw UI combobox. Files: src/components/combobox/

title: Implement DatePicker component
description: Calendar-based date selection with month/year nav, date ranges, min/max constraints. CRITICAL missing component. Reference: Thaw UI date-picker. Files: src/components/date_picker/

title: Implement Field component
description: Form field wrapper with label, validation state, error messages, help text. Reference: Thaw UI field. Files: src/components/field/

title: Implement Slider component
description: Range slider with single/dual handles, marks/ticks, vertical/horizontal, value tooltips. More advanced than existing Range. Reference: Thaw UI slider. Files: src/components/slider/

title: Implement SpinButton component
description: Number input with increment/decrement buttons, min/max, step, precision, hold-to-repeat. Reference: Thaw UI spin-button. Files: src/components/spin_button/

title: Implement TagPicker component
description: Multi-select with tag display, searchable, add custom tags, max selections. Reference: Thaw UI tag-picker. Files: src/components/tag_picker/

title: Implement TimePicker component
description: Time selection with hour/minute/second spinners, 12/24hr format, AM/PM, scrollable columns. CRITICAL missing component. Reference: Thaw UI time-picker. Files: src/components/time_picker/

title: Layout & Structure Components (6 components)
description: Implement layout and structural components from Thaw UI. Components: Flex, Grid, Layout, Space, Scrollbar, BackTop. These provide layout utilities and page structure.

title: Implement Flex component
description: Flexbox layout wrapper with direction, gap, justify, align props. Reference: Thaw UI flex. Files: src/components/flex/

title: Implement Grid component
description: CSS Grid layout wrapper with columns, rows, gap configuration. Reference: Thaw UI grid. Files: src/components/grid/

title: Implement Layout component
description: App shell with header/sidebar/content/footer areas. Reference: Thaw UI layout. Files: src/components/layout/

title: Implement Space component
description: Spacing utility component for consistent gaps between elements. Reference: Thaw UI space. Files: src/components/space/

title: Implement Scrollbar component
description: Custom scrollbar styling component. Reference: Thaw UI scrollbar. Files: src/components/scrollbar/

title: Implement BackTop component
description: Back-to-top floating button for long scrolling pages. Reference: Thaw UI back-top. Files: src/components/back_top/

title: Data Display & Typography Components (5 components)
description: Implement data display and typography components from Thaw UI. Components: Code, Image, Text, Tree, InfoLabel. Enhance content presentation and hierarchical data display.

title: Implement Code component
description: Code syntax display component with line numbers, highlighting, copy button. Reference: Thaw UI code. Files: src/components/code/

title: Implement Image component
description: Enhanced image component with lazy loading, placeholders, error fallback, zoom. Reference: Thaw UI image. Files: src/components/image/

title: Implement Text component
description: Typography component with size variants, weights, colors, truncation. Reference: Thaw UI text. Files: src/components/text/

title: Implement Tree component
description: Hierarchical tree view for file explorers, org charts, navigation. Expandable nodes, checkboxes, icons. CRITICAL missing component. Reference: Thaw UI tree. Files: src/components/tree/

title: Implement InfoLabel component
description: Information label with icon for help text, tooltips, info badges. Reference: Thaw UI info-label. Files: src/components/info_label/

title: Navigation Components (2 components)
description: Implement navigation components from Thaw UI. Components: Nav, Popover. Enhance navigation and contextual content display.

title: Implement Nav component
description: Navigation component with items, sub-items, active states. Different from Navbar. Reference: Thaw UI nav. Files: src/components/nav/

title: Implement Popover component
description: Floating content overlay for context menus, hover details. Different from Dropdown. CRITICAL missing component. Reference: Thaw UI popover. Files: src/components/popover/

title: Feedback & Loading Components (3 components)
description: Implement feedback and loading state components from Thaw UI. Components: LoadingBar, MessageBar, Spinner. Enhance user feedback during operations.

title: Implement LoadingBar component
description: Top-of-page loading progress bar like YouTube/GitHub. Fixed positioning, progress percentage. Reference: Thaw UI loading-bar. Files: src/components/loading_bar/

title: Implement MessageBar component
description: Inline message notifications for form feedback, alerts. Color variants, dismissable, icons. Reference: Thaw UI message-bar. Files: src/components/message_bar/

title: Implement Spinner component
description: Loading spinner for in-component loading states. Size variants. Similar to existing Loading but Thaw-style. Reference: Thaw UI spinner. Files: src/components/spinner/

title: Specialized Components (3 components)
description: Implement specialized UI components from Thaw UI. Components: Persona, Tag, Icon. Unique component types for specific use cases.

title: Implement Persona component
description: User profile card component with avatar, name, status, presence badge. Microsoft Fluent Design style. Reference: Thaw UI persona. Files: src/components/persona/

title: Implement Tag component
description: Tag/chip component for labels, filters, categories. Dismissable, color variants, sizes. Different from existing Badge. Reference: Thaw UI tag. Files: src/components/tag/

title: Implement Icon component with Lucide support
description: Icon component system with Lucide icon set integration (https://lucide.dev/icons/). Size variants, color props, rotation. Reference: Thaw UI icon + Lucide. Files: src/components/icon/. CRITICAL: Must support Lucide icons.

title: System Components (1 component)
description: Implement system-level components from Thaw UI. Component: ConfigProvider. Provides global configuration and theming infrastructure.

title: Implement ConfigProvider component
description: Global configuration provider for theme switching, i18n, app-wide settings. Context-based configuration. Integrates with existing ThemeController. Reference: Thaw UI config-provider. Files: src/components/config_provider/

title: Link buttons cause unwanted page scroll
description: On the Button page, when pressing Primary Link Button, Outline Link Button, or Ghost Link Button, the page scrolls up a few rows. This is likely caused by default anchor link behavior or focus management. Need to prevent default scroll behavior.

title: Phase 3: Typography Customization
description: Allow users to customize fonts, sizes, and type scales. Components: TypographyCustomizer with font family selector, base size slider, scale ratio picker, live preview.

title: Create TypographyCustomizer component
description: Build UI for typography controls with font family selector, base size slider, and scale ratio picker.

title: Add font family selection
description: Dropdown with popular fonts (Inter, Roboto, Poppins, Open Sans, Montserrat, etc.). Update --font-family CSS variable on selection.

title: Implement font scale system
description: Base size slider (12-20px) and scale ratio selector (minor third, major third, perfect fourth, etc.). Calculate and apply all font size CSS variables (--text-xs through --text-4xl).

title: Add Google Fonts integration
description: Optional: Load fonts dynamically from Google Fonts API. Inject font link into document head when user selects a font.

title: Create typography preview
description: Live preview showing different text sizes (xs, sm, base, lg, xl, 2xl, 3xl, 4xl) with current font family and scale. Update in real-time as user adjusts settings.

title: Test typography changes
description: Verify CSS variables apply correctly across all components. Test font loading, scale calculations, and persistence across theme switches.

title: Label page shows no content
description: On the Label page, nothing is visible. The demo/src/demos/label.rs file exists but components are not rendering. Need to investigate and fix rendering issue.

title: Enhance button push-depth for more pronounced effect
description: On the Button page, the button push-depth is very shallow. Enhance the push effect to be more pronounced or deeper for better visual feedback. This may involve adjusting box-shadow, transform, or transition properties.

title: Table pagination displays incorrect values and changes shape
description: On the Pagination page, in the 'Table with Pagination' section, the pagination component displays incorrect value and changes its basic shape/size when clicked. Need to investigate state management and CSS issues.

title: Fix README.md doctest failures
description:
Three doctests in README.md are failing due to syntax errors:

1. Line 27: Quote character issue - 'daisyui' instead of daisyui
2. Line 75: Double semicolon and code that needs to be in a function
3. Line 148: Incomplete code with ...

All examples need to be valid Rust code or marked with no_run or ignore attributes.

Files: README.md

title: Achieve 100% daisyUI component coverage
description:
Goal: Implement all daisyUI 5 components to achieve 100% coverage.

Current Status: 56/62 components implemented (90.3%)

Missing Components (6):
1. Calendar - Styling wrapper for calendar libraries
2. FAB (Floating Action Button) - Speed dial component
3. Tooltip - Contextual hover messages
4. Text Rotate - Animated text rotation
5. Hover Gallery - Interactive image gallery
6. Hover 3D Card - 3D tilt effect on hover

daisyUI 5 has 62 unique components (excluding duplicates like Accordion/Collapse which share implementation).

Component count breakdown:
- Actions: 6 components
- Data Display: 18 components  
- Navigation: 8 components
- Feedback: 7 components
- Data Input: 14 components
- Layout: 8 components
- Mockup: 4 components

Tracking Issues:
- leptos-daisyui-rs-0ug (Calendar)
- leptos-daisyui-rs-7ay (FAB)
- leptos-daisyui-rs-zk1 (Tooltip)
- leptos-daisyui-rs-7uq (Text Rotate)
- leptos-daisyui-rs-05c (Hover Gallery)
- leptos-daisyui-rs-rzu (Hover 3D Card)

Success Criteria:
- All 6 missing components implemented
- Components follow existing patterns
- Documentation complete
- CSS classes documented in input.css

title: Footer social icons cause page scroll on hover/click
description: On the Footer page, when scrolling down to any social icons, the page scrolls up a few rows. May be related to setting focus. Need to investigate and fix unwanted scroll behavior.

title: Implement Hover 3D Card component
description:
daisyUI includes a Hover 3D component that adds 3D hover effects to content.

Status: Not implemented (new in daisyUI 5)
Priority: Low (visual enhancement component)

CSS Class:
- hover-3d - Main wrapper class

HTML Structure:
- Wrapper with hover-3d class
- 8 empty div elements for hover zones
- Content inside wrapper

Features:
- 3D tilt effect based on mouse position
- 8 hover zones that detect mouse movement
- Smooth rotation based on mouse position
- Works with non-interactive content

Important Notes:
- Only use non-interactive content inside hover-3d
- If card needs to be clickable, wrap entire hover-3d in link
- Do NOT put buttons or links inside the component
- 8 div elements are required for the zones

Use Cases:
- Credit card displays
- Image galleries
- Product showcases
- Portfolio items

Reference: https://daisyui.com/components/hover-3d/

title: Filter page shows no content
description: On the Filter page, nothing is visible. The demo/src/demos/filter.rs file exists but components are not rendering. Need to investigate and fix rendering issue.

title: FAB Flower Layout shows buttons off-screen
description: On the FAB page, the Flower Layout (Quarter Circle) displays some floating buttons off the screen (invisible). The quarter circle should open to the right side of the initial button instead of the current position. Need to adjust positioning.

title: Fix Diff component reactive tracking warning
description: Diff component demo has reactive tracking warning at demo/src/demos/diff.rs:83:46. Signal accessed with .get() outside reactive tracking context. Fix: Wrap in reactive closure: color=move || if show_before.get() { ButtonColor::Primary } else { ButtonColor::Secondary }. Currently: color=if show_before.get() { ButtonColor::Primary } else { ButtonColor::Secondary }. Severity: Low (demo code only, component works). Discovered during: Visual validation testing.

title: Implement Text Rotate CSS animations for rotation effect
description: Text Rotate component renders HTML structure but lacks CSS keyframe animations for rotation effect. Text items have animationDuration: 0s, animation: none, className: empty. Should have: CSS @keyframes for rotation animation, animation classes applied to text items, configurable timing. Currently: Text items render but remain static, no rotation occurs. Needs: CSS animations stylesheet with rotate keyframes, animation properties applied to items. Test: Navigate to Text Rotate page - text is static, no rotation animation. Related issue: leptos-daisyui-rs-7v8

title: Status page shows no content
description: On the Status page, nothing is visible. The demo/src/demos/status.rs file exists but components are not rendering. Need to investigate and fix rendering issue.

title: Implement Hover Gallery functionality with JavaScript interaction
description: Hover Gallery component renders HTML structure but lacks JavaScript for hover interaction logic. Gallery images should reveal/animate on hover but remain static. Needs: JavaScript event handlers for mouseenter/mouseleave, CSS transforms for image positioning/reveal effects. Currently: Images render but no hover interaction occurs (transform: none, no position changes). Test: Hover over gallery items - no reveal animation. Related issue: leptos-daisyui-rs-7v8

title: Fix FAB speed dial buttons visibility (should be hidden initially)
description: FAB component speed dial buttons are visible initially instead of hidden until click/focus. All action buttons have opacity: 1, visibility: visible on page load. Should be: Hidden until FAB trigger is clicked/focused, then appear with animation. Currently: All buttons visible immediately, breaking speed dial UX pattern. Needs: CSS to set initial state (display: none or opacity: 0), transition on focus/click. Test: Navigate to FAB page - all buttons visible instead of hidden. Related issue: leptos-daisyui-rs-7v8

title: Phase 6: Component-Specific Overrides
description: Per-component style customization. Components: ComponentCustomizer with per-component controls. Update library components to use CSS variables.

title: Create ComponentCustomizer component
description: Build UI for component-specific overrides

title: Add Card component overrides
description: Border width, radius, padding controls for cards

title: Add Button component overrides
description: Border radius, padding, min-width controls

title: Add Input component overrides
description: Border width, padding, height controls

title: Update library components to use CSS variables
description: Modify Card, Button, Input, etc. to read CSS variables

title: Create component showcase
description: Live demo of all components with current settings

title: Verify component overrides
description: Verify all component overrides work correctly

title: Implement Tooltip component
description:
daisyUI includes a Tooltip component for displaying contextual messages on hover.

Status: Not implemented
Priority: High (very common UI component)

CSS Classes:
- tooltip - Main wrapper class
- tooltip-content - For custom HTML content
- Positioning: tooltip-top (default), tooltip-bottom, tooltip-left, tooltip-right
- Colors: tooltip-neutral, tooltip-primary, tooltip-secondary, tooltip-accent, tooltip-info, tooltip-success, tooltip-warning, tooltip-error
- Modifiers: tooltip-open (force display), lg:tooltip (responsive)

Content Methods:
1. data-tip attribute for simple text
2. tooltip-content div for custom HTML/styled content

Basic Pattern:
Container wraps trigger element (like button) and displays message on interaction.

Implementation Notes:
- Should support both data-tip and tooltip-content patterns
- Need to handle positioning variants
- Support for forced display (tooltip-open)
- Responsive variants

Reference: https://daisyui.com/components/tooltip/

title: Fieldset page shows no content
